dreams.quotes: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
dreams.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

dreams.quotes: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
dreams.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam

dreams.quotes: Dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.
dreams.author: T.E. Lawrence

dreams.quotes: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagines, he  will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
dreams.author: Henry David Thoreau

dreams.quotes: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
dreams.author: Paul Valery

dreams.quotes: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
dreams.author: Carl Sandburg

dreams.quotes: A dream doesn't become reality through magic, it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
dreams.author: Colin Powell

dreams.quotes: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
dreams.author: James Dean

dreams.quotes: Who looks outside, dreams, who looks inside, awakes.
dreams.author: Carl Jung

dreams.quotes: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
dreams.author: Oscar Wilde

dreams.quotes: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
dreams.author: Langston Hughes

dreams.quotes: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
dreams.author: Walt Disney

dreams.quotes: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self discipline, and effort.
dreams.author: Jesse Owens

dreams.quotes: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
dreams.author: Tupac Shakur

dreams.quotes: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision.
dreams.author: Janet Jackson

dreams.quotes: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
dreams.author: Anatole France

dreams.quotes: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
dreams.author: Yoko Ono

dreams.quotes: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.
dreams.author: Vincent Van Gogh

dreams.quotes: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
dreams.author: Joel Osteen

dreams.quotes: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
dreams.author: Edgar Cayce

dreams.quotes: So many dreams seems impossible, then they seem improbable, then we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
dreams.author: Christopher Reeve

dreams.quotes: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
dreams.author: Malcolm Forbes

dreams.quotes: Dreaming, after all is a form of planning.
dreams.author: Gloria Steinem

dreams.quotes: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities.
dreams.author: Gloria Steinem

dreams.quotes: Sleep is the best meditation.
dreams.author: Dalai Lama

dreams.quotes: Dreams are necessary to life.
dreams.author: Anais Nin

dreams.quotes: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
dreams.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

dreams.quotes: You can plant a dream.
dreams.author: Anne Campbell

dreams.quotes: Ideologies seperates us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.
dreams.author: Eugene Ionesco

dreams.quotes: I'm a dreamer. I have a dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.
dreams.author: Mike Tyson

dreams.quotes: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
dreams.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

dreams.quotes: When you have a dream that you cen't let go of, trust your instincts and pursue it.
dreams.author: Harvey Mackay

dreams.quotes: Remember, real dreams take work, take patience, and sometimes they require you to dig down deep. Be sure you're willing to do that.
dreams.author: Harvey Mackay

dreams.quotes: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.
dreams.author: Usher

dreams.quotes: The more you can dream, the more you can do.
dreams.author: Michael Korda

dreams.quotes: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
dreams.author: John Barrymore

dreams.quotes: You gotta have a dream If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?
dreams.author: Oscar Hammerstein II

dreams.quotes: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
dreams.author: Joseph Campbell

dreams.quotes: Dream in a pragmatic way.
dreams.author: Aldous Huxley

dreams.quotes: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher… or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.
dreams.author: Douglas Adams

dreams.quotes: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a You the  you choose to be.
dreams.author: Joy Page

dreams.quotes: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind togethers.
dreams.author: Jack Kerouac

dreams.quotes: My dreams were all my own, I accounted for them to nobody, they were my refuge when annoyed- my dearest pleasure when free.
dreams.author: Mary Shelley

dreams.quotes: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
dreams.author: George Bernard Shaw

dreams.quotes: Dreams can still come true, you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
dreams.author: Stefano Gabbana

dreams.quotes: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
dreams.author: Erma Bombeck

dreams.quotes: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.
dreams.author: Walter Scott

dreams.quotes: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.
dreams.author: Jim Valvano

dreams.quotes: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.
dreams.author: Eva Green

dreams.quotes: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
dreams.author: Sigmund Freud

dreams.quotes: Dream are true while they last…
dreams.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

dreams.quotes: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.
dreams.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

dreams.quotes: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way.
dreams.author: Baltasar Gracian

dreams.quotes: Saddle your dreams before you ride em.
dreams.author: Mary Webb
